0.text: Bug 27410  [SWT Examples] Arrow buttons won't resize for 10x10,50x50,100x100.

1.text: Overview Description:    In the 'SWT Controls' view of the SWT Examples software,    the SWT.ARROW type buttons (in the 'Button' tab) will not    resize to the 10x10, 50x50, and 100x100 sizes.

3.text: Open the 'SWT Controls' view of the 'SWT Examples' code   2.

4.text: Open the 'Button' tab in the SWT Controls view   3.

5.text: Try the 'Preferred' and 'Horizontal Fill' sizes, note that the       arrow buttons resize   4.

6.text: Select the SWT.ARROW style, and try sizes 10x10, 50x50, and 100x100      !BUG!

7.text: The arrow buttons will not resize  ------ Build 2002-11-07-1448 on Solaris (also occurs on HPUX)
